algorithm_technique: Frequency counting with XOR for parity check
Frequency counting with integer division for pairs
problem_summary_simple: Count pairs of identical numbers and remaining single numbers in an array.
problem_summary_technical: Utilizes frequency maps or XOR properties to count pairs and leftovers efficiently.
key_insights: XORing a count toggles its parity, useful for tracking odd/even occurrences.
The number of pairs is the count of elements with even occurrences.
Leftovers are elements with odd occurrences.
A frequency map directly stores counts of each number.
Integer division by 2 on counts gives the number of pairs.
Total elements minus twice the pair count gives leftovers.
